data.title: Summer's Gonna Last Forever
data.meta_description:
Summer's Gonna Last Forever by Liam Grundy, released 02 August 2024

Summer's Gonna Last Forever
I've been down so many times before
Never even coming close
Thought I'd learnt to make the most of it by now
Sometimes I'd think there was no way out
Then I'd hear you call my name
And nothing felt the same
Without a doubt
When it's cold and dark ahead and everything looks black
I know you'll be beside me
And I'll find my way back
The Summer's gonna last forever
They say how can I be sure
Yhe way it feels when we're together
I'm walking ten feet off the floor
Yeah the Summer's gonna last for sure
I can see the way ahead 
Everything is looking fine
There's a sun that shines
For you and me
Every day's a reason why
And a chance to start anew
But girl with me and you we don't need that
When it's cold and dark ahead and everything looks black
I know you'll be beside me
And I'll find my way back
Now the Summer's gonna last forever
They say how can I be sure
Well the way it feels when we're together
It's got me walking ten feet off the floor
Yeah the Summer's gonna last for sure
Summer's gonna last forever
Summer's gonna last forever
Summer's gonna last forever
Summer's gonna last!
data.text: Based in London England, songwriter/vocalist Liam Grundy records and performs solo or with a great band playing Rocking Country and Americana with a Rockabilly Edge.Liam has worked with artists like Dave Edmunds, Scotty Moore, James Burton amongst many others. He has worked in Nashville and Memphis as well as Europe and has recorded tracks for 'Houston' at the legendary Sun Studio in Memphis. ... more
